review_text: Loved our stay at Alan‚Äôs place! Perfect for a small group staying the weekend to visit Holiday World nearby. Peaceful/tranquil with plenty of cute farm animals!

Alan‚Äôs place is pretty isolated and rustic. The spiral staircase is a little difficult to navigate with large and heavy luggage buy we did manage. To Alan‚Äôs credit he did offer to help via a previous email but he was busy mowing hay when we got there. There is a stray golden cat that was a tripping hazard around the spiral staircase and did jump in our car on our toddlers lap. When my wife lifted up the cat gently to remove her it did scratch her so be careful around it as Alan says it is a stray. The place was very rustic with plenty of wood to decorate the walls and ceiling. Their was a beautiful new handmade dining room table and new stove and washer and dryer which all worked wonderfully. The loft is over a large garage and has a deck that is about 20 ft in the air. We felt some of the wood rails had large enough openings for our toddler to fall through so something to consider for staying. One morning we were awoken at 6:50 EST by barking dogs and there was occasional garage noise
We have a stayed here a few times and it is always clean and welcoming. I really enjoy sitting out on the deck and watching the farm life.
My mom and I loved this property and would like to come back. It was very peaceful and just the getaway we needed. We enjoyed seeing the farm animals and the cats! Highly recommend.
So incredible!!! Wish we had more time to stay longer that‚Äôs how amazing it was. The farm, the loft and just everything was a dream. Thank you so much Alan.
We loved our stay! Gorgeous view and comfortable place. Would absolutely recommend!
the property was beautiful and well maintained. Alan was a great host and very curious in everyday.

Allen and his family were so kind and made us feel right at home, we had fresh baked cookies when we got there by his amazing wife.
The place was so peaceful right on their farm with a pond to swim and fish with a slide for adults and kids to enjoy!
We booked for one night and loved it so much we had to book for another.
The home was so beatiful and stunning as well.
We will definitely be back!
This was such a unique place to stop! It was just off the beaten path and peaceful. The wood paneling gave the space a ton of charm. I would def stop here again!

We loved it!!! It was so peaceful and his home is so cozy! Getting to places was so easy and not too far from where we were. Kind people and very helpful when we asked questions. would definitely recommend to others. We will definitely rent again in the future!!
This is a really cool loft cabin. Your kids will love it.
We had an awesome stay. The covered porch was great to watch the stars and sunsets.

Wonderful rental on a farm in the country. Very peaceful and fun to watch the animals, pigs, cows, sheep, lamb, donkey, ducks, chickens, kittens and dogs. The hosts are excellent, very responsive and easy to get ahold of. My husband and I and our two dogs stayed for 6 weeks in the loft. The loft is beautifully done with lots of storage. The kitchen and bath are fully stocked with all the essentials you may need. The king bed is very comfy. I would highly recommend this rental.
The stay was nice until a local reached out about who the host was. I recommend doing research on who you book with before doing so.
Awesome spot to have some land with an amazing deck with great views of the ponds and animals!
A beautiful, quaint setting, short drive from local necessities. Nice little farm!
Great stay!
Amazing property and a great place to spend the night.

You can‚Äôt help but arrive, take a look at your surroundings, a take a deep breath and let it all out. It‚Äôs that tranquil of a place. Listening to the sheep, looking at the ducks and water, smelling the wood from the loft. It‚Äôs just beautiful and I will book a stay at a later date when it‚Äôs warm and can explore the outdoors. Alan was very accommodating to my last minute needs as I am a travel nurse which I appreciated so much.
Very clean and well upkeep. Loved the location and how peaceful it was. Great deal for the price. Highly Recommend!
Cookies, kittens, and a cool place to stay! Unfortunately, we were traveling and only had one night to stay here. Great place!

We loved our stay with Alan and Amy. It was fun seeing all the inventive work they put into building The Loft. For a tall winding stairs it was very user friendly and easy to climb. Also the hosts offered to help with luggage several times. The porch/deck was great and would be a great place to hang out in warm weather. The Loft was very comfortable and livable and very well thought out with lots of ingenious storage spaces. I enjoyed the deep bath tub which was easy to get into and out of. My daughter LOVED the cats that visited us on the porch and playing with the kittens in the morning. My husbands favorite was the plate of divinity Amy left on the table for us. The farm setting and all the animals were relaxing and we felt very safe leaving our car partially packed for the night. We would definitely recommend their bnb to others & will return if in the area again.
Clean, quiet and secure parking for our vehicle filled with personal belongings, out in the country. Front door and shower window need coverings for privacy but other than that, great stay.
This Airbnb was a great stay for what we needed! It had plenty of room and was very cozy.
super nice place

I have stayed at both of their places a total of almost 10 months in the past 1.5 years. Always a delight to stay. Both places are always clean and the property itself is gorgeous. Alan and the family are great welcoming people, always happy to go out of their way to make you feel right at home.
Can't recommend their place enough. It's been my favorite out of the 40+ I've stayed at.
Gaslight is near with good food and Schnitzelbank is the best German restaurant I've found in the US.
Great place to stay. Peaceful homestead/farm atmosphere. Gracious and hospitable family. Would stay again.
Peaceful country loft. Would definitely stay again.

Wonderful stay at Alan's. It was the perfect location for a weekend getaway with my brother and Dad. The ponds were perfect for fishing during the day and dining table was perfect for games at night. Even enjoyed a few movies on the SmartTV...which included "A League of Their Own." If anyone is familiar with that movie, you have to take a tour of League Stadium downtown Huntingburg. Its where they filmed the home games for that movie. The tour was fantastic.
I've stayed at Alan's properties multiple times when in the area. They are always very nice!

This was the perfect place to stay for a weekend fall trip to Holiday World. The loft was clean and ready for us when we arrived. Alan was quick to reply to my questions and was very accommodating. My son and I had a good time. Thank you!

Alan was very kind and helpful throughout our entire stay. The loft was beautiful and the surrounding area was so peaceful and wonderful. It is a bit far from restaurants and things like that, but we knew that going into it. It was nice to unplug for a few days at this beautiful place. Alan was responsive and friendly and even made us cookies when we checked in!
Such a peaceful place! The cookies are delicious and so thoughtful. Vallarta Mexican grill is delicious.

My husband and I came and stayed in the loft for a night on their families beautiful farm. We couldn‚Äôt have enough good things to say. It was just what we needed. The farm was beautiful and so peaceful. We enjoyed sitting out on the deck and watching all of the animals. Listening to the ducks was my favorite. We also loved being able to walk around and spend time with each other in such a relaxing environment. We will definitely be back and hope to bring our family.
I've stayed here multiple times. Very scenic place off the path. It's very relaxing after a long day or work.
amazing time first air bnb definitely comeback again and again

Exactly as described. Location was brilliant to see my son in Oakland City. Peaceful, relaxing and lovely surroundings. Has 3 fishing lakes which was perfect for us to fish when relaxing. Caught large mouth bass in all three plus a Blue Gill and a Cat Fish each. Just perfect stay. Tarts on the table were delicious. Thank you for a great stay.

This place was wonderful! Everything so incredibly clean & it was such a cute loft! There were homemade cookies on the table that were delicious & my kids loved the animals that were all over the place. We also fished in the ponds and caught a lot which my kids also loved! It was a dream weekend.
fabulous place in the country. super clean cabin, terrace to watch the animals. definitely recommended
A peaceful, beautiful place to stay. We loved seeing and meeting the animals and found the loft to be comfortable and clean.
We would stay again!

What an idyllic stay! Great hosts and beautiful surroundings. We enjoyed the farm setting and animals with a nice walk through the property and great views of animal life from the loft deck. Beautifully hand-crafted loft and furnishings with everything we needed. Cookie treats were a lovely welcoming touch. Thank you!
I stayed here with my mom and brother on our way to the Lucas Oil Golf Course. It worked out well. We had everything we needed at Alan's place. The set up is very functional.

as a travel nurse I've stayed in many airbnbs. this is by far one of my fave! peaceful, beautiful, Alan and his family are very attentive and kind! I was greeted with homemade goodies each time I've stayed! I highly recommended any of their homes. The loft though is just beautiful!!

Alan and his folks have a great place to stay. The space was very clean and the homemade sweets on arrival were great. We brought our three dogs (two of which are bird dogs) and took them on walks around the farm which was probably the greatest part of the whole place. The three weenie dogs did bark at our dogs a little bit but were easily shooed away with the help of my wife, if you bring your dogs just make sure you bring leashes and you‚Äôll be fine. Overall, this was a great place to stay, super clean, relaxing, and away from city life. Wouldn‚Äôt hesitate to stay again.
Great stay, cozy and peaceful. We will return.
Great space for a quite retreat getaway. It was just what we were looking for in the area!
We loved our stay, it was absolutely perfect. We were greeted by a bunch of little farm animals and homemade chocolate chip cookies! The place was clean and spacious. We will definitely be back!

Very beautiful inside the loft. It was cute seeing all the farm animals and lots of scenery. My only two slight grievances were the door to the bedroom that led out to the garage. I wasn‚Äôt too comfortable with the idea of a door that led to outside in the place where I slept. Unfortunately, it led to some difficulties sleeping for the first two nights. My other comment would be, when the dogs were outside, it was a bit difficult to go up and down the driveway. They would get close to the car and make us worried they would get in front of it. Reasonable pricing, Alan was very polite, and accommodating. Overall a great trip!

Amazingly reasonable price!!! Didn't inflate cleaning or service fees. Friendly host and friendly family! Children were very polite and respectful. Couldn't ask for a better host and experience! Future possible guests should be aware that they are staying over a sometimes-active garage and workspace that was quiet during 'normal' quiet hours. Thanks for a wonderful stay which included delicious fresh bread waiting for consumption upon arrival!!

I loved this stay. I needed a place to stay after visiting Holiday World and this place was amazing. The Loft was so beautiful and had a home-y feel to it. The view of the lake and the different animals was incredible as well. The host, Alan, was more than welcoming, very responsive and helpful, and always open to questions. I will definitely stay here again, it was outstanding. üòÅ

This place was amazing! So peaceful, and surrounding with animals. We felt right at home from the time we arrived. Alan was communicative, kind and went above and beyond. This will be a must-stay for us for future trips!
Alan‚Äôs loft is WONDERFUL! My friends and I had a blast! (And appreciated the cookies at check-in AND the ketchup being brought up to us when we reached out!)

It definitely is farm life, which some may like and some may not. There is animal poop pretty much everywhere‚Äîincluding the parking area. We never noticed a smell in loft or even on the deck.

We loved the giant sectional in the living room and the big screen TV with streaming channels. It was only 3 miles to town for restaurants and groceries. I gave it 5 stars. The only thing I want to warn parents about is that the bedroom does not have a door. If you want privacy from your kids while vacationing, this is not the AirBNB for you.

It was just what we were looking for in a stay. It was private and a beautiful area with a peaceful view of the land from the patio! The kitchen was equipped with plenty of dishes and cookware which was desirable for us as we stayed for a longer period and like to cook at home. Alan was very responsive and provided us clear instructions on how to find the location.

This is our second time there and we loved it even more! The host is amazing and super helpful. There was new living room furniture. The beauty there seeps into your soul. Watching the ducks in the three small lakes/ponds, the sheep, cows, hogs etc. is super fun too. It is a perfect place for us. It is for sure, a place we will go to again.
It was a great stay. Wish we could've stayed longer to explore the homestead and lake a little bit, but the whole place was very cozy.
Just as described, cookies at check in, very friendly hosts.

We had a lovely long weekend at the loft! It was so nice to enjoy the rain from the covered deck, watch the farm animals, see lightning bugs and walk around the lake with our dog. The bed and pillows were comfy and the kitchen was great to cook in; had just about everything needed. Loved the cookies ‚Äî thanks!

Alan was a lovely host! He greeted us when we arrived, and they had homemade cookies waiting for us inside the Airbnb! The location was very peaceful, quiet, and the animals were all very adorable. We would stay here again.
Great place! So awesome to see the homestead and how accommodating they are to guests. Can‚Äôt wait to come back with my kids

They are extremely friendly, accommodating and accepting. Stayed at many places over the years from bnb, can't recommend either of their places enough.
I'm a DN, the cell based internet is a minimum of 10Mbs at both. So enough to do most jobs and have clear video conferencing. Hasn't went down so far in snow or rain. The recliners are great at both if that's your style.

A cute & secluded loft on a farm, that comes with all the added features a farm has to offer such as the sounds of ducks, cows and pigs! Was nice to sit on the large deck and listen to the animals. Quiet, clean, beautiful, accessible.

Perfect for our stay at Holiday World. Slept my family of 4 comfortably and that king size bed was so comfortable!

What a beautiful place! We loved everything about it!

Thank you again!!!!
The host family is very gracious and hospitable. The Loft was spacious and clean and provided everything that we needed. Especially enjoyed the large deck where we could watch the farm animals.

Sweet place to stay with homemade cookies at check-in!üòä

Everything was as described.
Very clean and comfortable place to stay! Would definitely return!

A great quiet place. Very friendly and helpful assistance when I arrived.

The Loft is a little slice of Heaven.

I wish we‚Äôd had more than one night, as their guests.

It was peaceful for my 3 month stay
Clean, homey, good amenities, and homemade bread!

Comfy bed and quite, perfect stay!

Everything was awesome and amazing. They met us when we arrived and they were very welcoming and friendly. We loved the country environment and the country look on the inside. We would love to stay in the future when needed.

Beautiful space and great host!
Beautiful house and property! We will definitely book again in the future.
